entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 44 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34.
